title: Damian Collins – 2022 Comments on Penny Mordaunt Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Damian Collins, the Conservative MP for Folkestone and Hythe, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
I was proud to support Penny Mordaunt campaign for the leadership of Conservative Party this summer, and I hope she stands again now. She has the quality and experience to unite the party and rebuild trust in government.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
